prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Pipe, Drums, Organ, Bass, Guitar, but without Piano.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Pipe, Drums, Organ, Bass, and Guitar, but Piano is absent.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Pipe, Drums, Organ, Bass, and Guitar, but Piano is not included.

Style 3:
This composition is made up of Pipe, Drums, Organ, Bass, and Guitar, omitting Piano.
